name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo [P_ptI5iH7Vg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: A pre-concert informational loop for 'Watame Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo', displaying venue rules, SNS guidelines, fan-sent flower stands, and official merchandise.

subtitles.original: マスクの着用にご協力ください / 公演中に声を出しての応援はご遠慮ください
subtitles.english: Please wear a mask and refrain from cheering out loud.

subtitles.original: 公演中は席の移動はお控えください
subtitles.english: Please refrain from moving from your seat during the performance.

subtitles.original: 携帯電話はマナーモードに設定をお願いいたします
subtitles.english: Please set your mobile phone to silent mode.

subtitles.original: 撮影・録音・録画は禁止とさせていただきます
subtitles.english: Photography, audio recording, and filming are prohibited.

subtitles.original: SNSでの感想投稿OK / スクリーンショット投稿OK
subtitles.english: Posting impressions and screenshots on SNS is OK.

subtitles.original: 動画の切り抜き・ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固く禁止します
subtitles.english: Clipping, mirror streaming, and illegal uploading are strictly prohibited.
